section.title: val_startsWith
section.para: This rule property specifies that a string must start with a specific value.
For example, the following is valid:
section.programlisting: <unit id="1"> <val:validation> <val:rule startsWith="*" /> </val:validation> <segment id="1"> <source>*Choose an option in the online store.</source> <target>*Escolha uma opção na loja online.</target> </segment> </unit> { "id": "1", "kind": "unit", "val_validation": [ "startsWith": "*" ], "subunits": [ { "id": "1", "kind": "segment", "source": [ { "text": "*Choose an option in the online store." } ], "target": [ { "text": "*Escolha uma opção na loja online." } ], } ] }
